io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.schedule

Class ScheduleRepeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.schedule.ScheduleRepeat

  • public class ScheduleRepeat
extends java.lang.Object
    A local interface for a schedule repeat. Schedule repeats define the how often and how long a schedule will repeat. The setter methods in this class will not have an effect on the Aurora.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScheduleRepeat(RepeatType intervalType, int intervalValue, java.util.Date endTime)
      Creates a new schedule repeat object that defines how often and how long a schedule repeats.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScheduleRepeat

        public ScheduleRepeat(RepeatType intervalType,
                      int intervalValue,
                      java.util.Date endTime)
        Creates a new schedule repeat object that defines how often and how long a schedule repeats.
        Parameters:
        intervalType - the type of interval
        intervalValue - the value of the interval (for example, 3 days)
        endTime - the time after which the schedule will no longer be run
